document.full_text: the africa progress panel, an international group of prominent individuals led by the diplomat kofi annan, said thursday that the continent was experiencing strong but low-quality economic growth.
document.title: africa: panel says africa is too reliant on raw exports
lines_and_colors: the africa progress panel, an international group of prominent individuals led by the diplomat kofi annan, said thursday that the continent was experiencing strong but low-quality economic growth.
